## Time Series


```{r d01-timeseries-vis, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Visualization of time series data"}

library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv(file = "data/2021-06_aasee.csv")
colnames(df) = c("date", "temperature", "ph", "o2")
df$date <- as.Date(df$date)
dfmean <- df %>% group_by(date) %>% summarise(temperature = mean(temperature))
ggplot(dfmean, aes(date, temperature))+
    geom_line()+
    theme_light()
```

## Geospatial Data

* defined by explicit location on the earth surface
* information attached to coordinates

```{r d01-geospatial, echo = FALSE}
set.seed(10)
mof_trees = sf::st_read("data/mof/mof_trees.gpkg", quiet = TRUE) %>% 
    na.omit() %>%
    slice_sample(n = 25) %>% 
    select(-socialposition) %>% 
    mutate(dbh = round(dbh, 2))


knitr::kable(
  sf::st_drop_geometry(mof_trees)[1:4,], caption = 'Geospatial Data: Tree locations',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
```


## Geospatial Data

```{r d01-geospatial-vis, echo = FALSE}
mapview::mapviewOptions(basemaps = c("OpenStreetMap.DE"))
mapview::mapview(mof_trees, zcol = "dbh")
```
